ygData.subject: Research on ability scores for bards
ygData.msgSnippet: To fuel the neverending debate on what are the most important stats for a bard, I would like to do some research to determine what the average stats are for
ygData.messageBody:
To fuel the neverending debate on what are the most important stats for a
bard, I would like to do some research to determine what the average stats
are for bard characters. If you want to participate, send me your
character's base stats. Be sure to take off any item that
increases/decreases a stat. If I get enough responses to make it a valid
sample I will publish the results. I will publish the averages as well as
the standard deviations for each stats.

No need to clutter up the mailing list for this so request you send me the
stats via email.

Thanks
Galtin
E'ci
